excerpt: Determined to civilize his dead partner’s no-good son, a former lawman recruits the kid a wife through the mail order catalog.
title: Mail Order Bride

excerpt: A murdered woman’s tabby cat terrorizes her killers in a gloomy old mansion.
title: The Shadow of the Cat

excerpt: Three California surf bums grow up and apart through the 1960s and into the 70s, as the world changes around them.
title: Big Wednesday

excerpt: An insurance investigator tracking a missing horror novelist discovers the author’s fiction is bleeding into reality.
title: In the Mouth of Madness

excerpt: Awaiting execution, Baron Frankenstein recounts how he created life from corpse parts—and how his partner’s sabotage turned genius into monster.
title: The Curse of Frankenstein
